name: Phage (worzz)
description:
You play the role of a phagocytic cell that engulfs viruses called phages that invade cells in your environment and replicate inside them.  You want to avoid the spread of these viruses and save the few cells in your hypotethical microbial ecosystem.

If a virus invades a cell it multiplies inside, the cell then ruptures giving rise to more viruses.
